conversation.message:
Thank you, Parent_E. Yes—our remaining place is still being held while we complete the allocation process in line with our priority order, so we’re not in a position to confirm an offer yet.

Timeline-wise, we expect to have clearer confirmation over the next few rounds; if the place is not taken by a higher-priority family, we will revisit remaining interested families immediately.

If you’d like, please share (1) preferred start date and any flexibility, (2) days/hours needed, and (3) any relevant notes (siblings, commute constraints, etc.). We’ll keep your details on file so we can move quickly if the place becomes available.

conversation.message:
Hello Nursery_E—thank you for the update. As requested, here are my details so you can move quickly if the place becomes available:

1) Start date: I can start immediately, and I’m also flexible to start at the beginning of next month/term if that’s easier.
2) Days/hours: I can do full-time (Mon–Fri) and am flexible on drop-off/pick-up times within your standard hours.
3) Notes: No sibling currently enrolled. Commute is manageable and we can reliably attend all required hours/activities.

Nursery_E remains my first choice, and if the spot is offered I can confirm the same day and complete all paperwork right away. If you’re able to share whether the higher-priority family has responded yet (or an updated decision timeline), I’d really appreciate it. Thank you again.
conversation.thought: Only Nursery_E remains unmatched and it is my top true preference. conversation.message:
Thank you, Parent_E—this is very helpful. We’ve noted your flexibility on start date and full-time schedule, and that commute/reliability won’t be an issue.

At the moment, our remaining place is still being held while we complete the allocation process in line with our priority order, so we can’t confirm an offer yet. We expect to have an update within the next few rounds; if the place is not taken by a higher-priority family, we will contact you immediately and move quickly given you’re ready to confirm and complete paperwork the same day.

If anything changes on your side (preferred start window, days/hours, or any new constraints), please let us know so we can keep your file current.
